text:
AI content is everywhere and 99% of it is slop...

meanwhile it takes 2 hours to build a system that creates content 10x better than most humans

here's the difference between AI slop and undetectable AI content:
- strong prompt engineering
- specific brand voice development
- feeding tons of good copywriting examples to AI

if you think you can spot AI content, you're wrong bro

there are accounts with 200k+ followers running 100% AI tweets on autopilot, major blogs completely automated, newsletters with 20k+ subs fully AI written

but most people won't do the work to build proper systems... they want instant results with zero effort
